content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If employees with certain skills were NOT found at EPAM - the Resource Manager can continue seeking people on the Market.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The process starts with creating a Hiring Container.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":32066,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ee91eb82-7bdf-4072-abb3-edaa3a1c1fff/hiring 1.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ee91eb82-7bdf-4072-abb3-edaa3a1c1fff/hiring 1.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"hiring 1.PNG\",\"name\":\"hiring 1.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"ee91eb82-7bdf-4072-abb3-edaa3a1c1fff\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":917,\"height\":127},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The first step of the hiring procedure is to create a Hiring Container.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A Hiring Container is an entity that is created to show that there is a demand to hire some specialists from the market or transform some EPAM trainees into full value employees to staff project or opportunity positions.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A Hiring Container has a list of requisitions and each of them requires to be filled with a new specialist from the market or a trainee (hired). Every Requisition inside the hiring container shows what requirements a candidate should meet to do related work.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Keep in mind that Hiring Container does not have to be tied to an existing project.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All Hiring Containers should be approved by an authorized Hiring Container approver. Once the Hiring Container is approved, a corresponding recruiting team (according to the location) gets notified that hiring is required.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Tips:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMSTAFPUB/Hiring+Container?src=contextnavpagetreemode\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Hiring approval.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"After the offer is approved by the Offer approver and accepted by the Regular employment agreement\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is signed in a case when an employee will work in EPAM office. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As a rule, such employees have an assigned workplace. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2. Employment agreement for remote work\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is signed in cases when an employee works: \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"from home. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"in a flexible mode (working partly from home, and partly in the office). \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For instance, an employee works mostly from home and sometimes can come to work at the EPAM office. Most commonly, the employee does not have an assigned workplace. The employee can use the Hoteling system and book a workplace themselves. Also, workplaces can be booked for a project or a unit. That is what we call a Dedicated Hoteling. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employees can still come and work at the offices where the transition to the Hoteling system has not been completed yet, without prior booking of their workplaces. But this is a temporary solution. In the end, all workplaces in the offices will be assigned either to certain employees or to the Hoteling system. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please address any questions to your Manager, People Partner or \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:AskOnboarding@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ask Onboarding\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
